version_description:
1. Fix the bug that replays no sound after the pause
2. Fix a bug that automatically plays the next video failed
3. Added support for background playback
4. Perfect fit iPad split screen
5. Adapt to iOS 11 drag and drop operation
6. Other o

1. Added SMB file sharing support
2. Add subtitle encoding options to solve the default encoding garbled problem
3. Add a new decoder selection, add a decoder 2, if some video playback does not move, please switch the decoder to try

1. Fit iPhone XS Max
2. Fix the bug that the controller view may not disappear on iOS 12

• Add Codec 3, if there is video decoding or playback error, please try to switch decoder in the upper right corner
• Added Touch ID / Face ID settings
• Add settings - automatically play the next item
• Sorting is selected to work on the subdire

• Adapter iPhone XS Max and iOS 12, while fixing iOS 9.2 and below system crash bug
• Record the last selected sorting method
• Fixed bug where SMB share could not display MKV format video
• Added SMB link username and password for optional remin

• Update player core for improved performance and stability
• Fix the bug after selecting decoder 3, double-clicking the right edge is not fast forward 1s

• Fixed an issue with mkv videos crashing on iOS 12
• Two-finger pinch to zoom the video size
• Two-finger click to switch video gravity
• The more action button appears in the upper right corner after the video enters full screen

• Update the player core
         • Support for non-standard encoding MP4
         • Added default AV1 decoder - dav1d

• Support manual selection of subtitles and closed captions
• Support for switching audio tracks and subtitle tracks
• File Management Support Search
• SMB optimization
         • SMB supports search, so

• Adapt Swift 5 to reduce app size
• Fix bug where playback progress is lost after exiting App

• Adapt to iOS 13, fix bugs that cannot be full screen
• Update player kernel

• Perfect fit for iOS 12.4.1
• Update player kernel
• Support for playing and importing album videos (click on the top left plus + - photo gallery)
• Fixed bug that the sound is not synchronized when using Screen Mirror

• Adapt to iOS 13 and dark mode
• Display network, time and battery information when iPhone video is full screen
• Add new file and cache size in more
• Record progress over 60s of video
• Direct link support editing title and URL

• Improve SMB connectivity
• Update player kernel
• Optimized iOS 13 Diablo mode display

• Updated the latest player kernel to adapt to iOS 13.3.1
• Improve SMB connection
• Video support screenshot
• Double-click on both sides to fast forward and rewind to show the animation
• Configurable double-click fast forward and rewind tim

• 更新播放器内核
• 修复iOS 14系统上全屏旋转错误的bug
• 新增长按加速播放功能
